steps.title: Simultaneous Multithreading
steps.content: Simultaneous Multithreading In the tech world, â€œSMTâ€ abbreviates simultaneous multithreading. The process combines hardware multithreading with superscalar processor technology. Basically, SMT is what makes your computerâ€™s central processing unit (CPU) work. [6] X Research source â€œThe SMT doesnâ€™t look repairable. A new CPU may be needed. Is it an Intel computer?â€ â€œWeâ€™re learning about SMTs this semester, so thatâ€™s been pretty epic.â€

steps.title: Surface-Mount Technology
steps.content: Surface-Mount Technology When talking about technology, â€œSMTâ€ may be used to abbreviate surface-mount technologies. These components are attached to the surface of a circuit board in electrical engineering. So, if someone adds â€œSMTâ€ to a message with other electrical jargon, like â€œcomponentâ€ or â€œsolder,â€ theyâ€™re most likely using it in this context. [7] X Trustworthy Source Science Direct Online archive of peer-reviewed research on scientific, technical and medical topics Go to source â€œThe SMT needs soldering, or we could just use a new component.â€ â€œI think an SMT component would be the best bet.â€

steps.title: Spinal Manipulative Therapy
steps.content: Spinal Manipulative Therapy Medically, â€œSMTâ€ is used as shorthand for spinal manipulative therapy. This treatment technique is done by chiropractors and uses massages to press spinal joints into place. Doctors will discuss SMT with patients who have back pain. [8] X Research source â€œMy doctor suggested I try SMT. Have you ever done that before?â€ â€œSMT seems to help people, and Iâ€™ll do anything to get rid of this back pain.â€
